title: well forums are dead now
body:
just like my hopes of getting ao shin this year.

rip OCE forums, 2013-2014

replies.body: I prefer boards TBH, better layout and UI, better communication, faster replies!!!

It's a shame, but I don't mind it at the same time.
I'll miss those who shall leave but they'll forever be in mah heart. {{item:3070}}

At least when I hate on Pantheon I can use icons! {{champion:80}} 

And when I try to sell an ~~imaginary~~ amazing product which makes you into a super swag god I can sell it in style {{item:2037}}

I'm gonna start having a signature now.

* --Bring back OCE Forums*

wtf even the Italics thing isn't working properly...

This board how work....
Don't know how to use...

I was reading your reply to ChocCake when i found out...

Wanted to reply to it...
Bye forums...
Gone now...
Like my cat...
why are you touching 6 month old posts

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=jTfKBnJO,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-21T02:43:50.132+0000)
>
> why are you touching 6 month old posts

jesus christ have boards been around for 6 months?
it feels like it's been no time at all.
why are you... touching 6 month old post
Then go give grandma a hug, say hello, and give her a nice day out.
> implying ao shin was scheduled for this year to be released??
It's showing as backward chronological order...wtf
Welcome to the Dark Side Tomato-san!
Bring back the forums Rito, Forums was heaps easier to use, than this rubbish

Dang, I wanna join Furret's thread so much.

And Riot please, can we have the forum back? I really don't like Board personally.
